plot: Finn and Jake storm Magic Man's house to rescue his new apprentice.

Finn and Jake storm Magic Man's house to rescue his new apprentice who turns out to be Betty. Betty and Magic Man create a system that will make Magic Man the new King of Mars. He has a vision about his dead wife who he magically cloned but instead was supposed to be used as a weapon to stop a space demon. Betty has a vision of how to save Simon and absorbs Magic Man's powers leaving him normal.—Dali Brljevic
